examples: Cook: I don't think you know what I am, mate. ... I'm a fucking waste of space. I'm just a stupid kid. I got no sense. A criminal. I'm no fucking use, me. I am nothing. So, please... please... get it into, you know, into your bonce... that you killed my friend. And... I'm Cook. I'M COOK!

entries.meaning: (dated) The kind of marble used in the game of bonce about.
examples: BONCE ABOUT is played with a big kind of marbles, called “bonces.” … The first player puts down his bonce,  […]
